snippet.title: Demonschool - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Meet the playable characters of Demonschool, learn about their abilities, and see them in action in this latest trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactics RPG where motion equals action. Demonschool will be available on PC, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation in 2024, and a new demo will be available during Steam Next Fest. In Demonschool, defeat big sinister weirdos in between the human and demon worlds as Faye and her misfit companions, while navigating university life on a mysterious island.
